reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that Sintelly collects various types of personal data to provide, improve, and personalize their Services.
reply.reference: Sintelly collects various types of personal data to provide, improve, and personalize our Services. URL: https://sintelly.com/privacy-policy

- Password

- Time zone (from iOS and Android apps)
- What Sintelly should call you

Children’s Privacy
Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 18 (“Children”).
We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 18. If you are a parent or guardian and you are concerned that your child has provided us with personal data, please contact us, and we will take steps to remove such information from our systems.

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects email address, other personal data including birthdate, password, personal data shared by partners, referral or access code, time zone, and user's preferred name.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly outlines the types of personal data that the app collects when declared. The data types range from basic contact information to personal preferences.
reply.reference: Email address, Other personal data you provide to us, including any personal identifiers like your birthdate, Password, Personal data you’ve allowed one of our partners to share with us, Referral or access code (if applicable), Time zone (from iOS and Android apps), What Sintelly should call you. URL: https://sintelly.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states the purposes for which personal data is collected and used.
reply.reference: Sintelly collects your personal data for several purposes, including to provide and maintain the Services, notify you about changes, provide customer support, improve the Services, monitor usage, detect technical issues, fulfill contractual obligations, send marketing materials, and for any other purpose with your consent. URL: https://sintelly.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection and delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that users can opt out of data collection and delete their data by contacting the Data Protection Officer at the provided email address.
reply.reference: You can always opt out of receiving communications from Sintelly. To opt out, please follow the instructions included in the email or notification you receive from us. URL: https://sintelly.com/privacy-policy

You have the right to receive a paper copy of this privacy policy.
Please contact our Data Protection Officer at info@sintelly.com to exercise any of the rights listed above.

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties as mentioned in the privacy policy.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that the app may share personal data with third parties under specific circumstances, such as service providers or partner programs.
reply.reference: b. Partner Programs - 'Potential program partners may include employers, hospitals, providers, or other medical and academic partners. Your participation in partner programs will be optional and will require your agreement with our partner for any personal data to be shared.'; c. Interactions with Third-Party Services - 'Our Services may link to third parties, like helplines or other resources. Any information shared with or otherwise collected by third parties is subject to the third party’s terms and privacy policy.' URL: https://sintelly.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with Service Providers like Amazon Web Services and potential program partners in organizations such as employers, hospitals, providers, or other medical and academic partners.

content: potential program partners in organizations like employers, hospitals, providers, or other medical and academic partners

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that the app shares data with Service Providers like Amazon Web Services and potential program partners. This implies that personal data is shared with third parties for various purposes.
reply.reference: a. Service Providers Sintelly uses third-party service providers, like Amazon Web Services, that assist us in providing our Services. These third parties may have limited and controlled access to personal data for the services they provide. b. Partner Programs In the future, Sintelly may partner with organizations to conduct research studies or provide you with the Services through separate programs. Potential program partners may include employers, hospitals, providers, or other medical and academic partners. URL: https://sintelly.com/privacy-policy
